attributes.action: Make voting legally mandatory for all eligible voters
attributes.additional_details: In many countries around the world, voting is mandatory and can result in a penalty. This can only do good and is important because it makes people realise the importance of their democratic vote and voice.
attributes.background: The purpose of every government is to develop and implement various policies for the benefit of its citizens. It also enables the person with the right to question the government about issues and clarifications. Voting is the way to express the opinion of a citizen in a democratic nation.
